TopicTitle: Gilly: The place of no Gravity.

Articles.Content: When you replace geocentric system with gilliocentric one.
Gilly:  The place where what goes up doesn't always come back down.

Gilly, the place where bleeding off fuel with a vent will send you into a suborbital trajectory bringing you halfway across the little body.

Gilly, the place where you can preform a suicide burn with a single Spark engine.

Gilly, the place where TWR can only be represented with scientific notation.

Gilly, the place that can be accidentally knocked out of orbit by a Kerbal landing at sub-meter/second speeds.

Gilly, the place where escape velocity is measured in “yoctametres per hour”

Gilly, the place where if you refuel too much, it disappears.
Gilly, the one that should be loved ;(
Gilly, the place where you put the parachute below for soft landing.
Gilly, the place where the only usable size of rovers are XXXL size rovers
Gilly. The place of no touchdown. Only touchup.

Gilly, in the dark, where your target is so close, but you don't notice it's on the far side until it's too late...

Still, I like Gilly.  It's the only place you keep the space station you're refueling 42km directly overhead (geosynchronous) and it's a fast elevator ride up and down with the mining rig.  No more orbitally curvy Hohmann hocus-pocus...

Edited October 11, 2020 by Hotel26
Gilly is the only place where big engines are not needed.
gilly: the only moon you can deborbit
Gilly. The place of just three fundamental forces.
Gilly: where you can practice Brachistochrone trajectories for KSP 2.
Gilly: Where Xenon Engines have a TWR of more than one.

Gilly: The place where cotton candy is you.

Gilly: The place where soap bubbles launch you.

Edited December 7, 2020 by kerbiloid

Gilly: The place where Farting stinks up the whole Cabin

Gilly: the only place where Dead Memes are from

Gilly: the only place where you can kill Disney's magic and toast Universal's Superheroes

Gilly: the only place where it says "Watch Your Step"

Gilly: the only place where hope becomes utterly useless.

Gilly: home of the "mount please like this comment or else!" 

Gilly: the only place where Ion engines are welcome

Gilly: the only place where Your fart is a launch vehicle

Gilly: the only place where maneuver nodes are pointless

Gilly: the only place that looks like McDonald's Undercooked chicken nuggets 

Gilly: the only place where Arnold Schwarzenegger wont find you

Gilly: the only place where Using Kerbals as landing legs is beneficial

Gilly: the only place where a Lander is absolutely Useless

Gilly: the only place where the ground has an apoapsis

Edited December 7, 2020 by DAFATRONALDO2007 IN SPACE
Gilly: the only place that doesn't ask you " Hey kids, why did ya edit this post"?
Gilly: The only moon of eve
Gilly, the only moon where if you just do a puff with an Ant, your in orbit
G is for Gilly. Not for Gravity.
Gilly: the best
Gilly: The place where you bail out crying "Gillonimo!" and then start waiting for fall.
When you land on Gilly, the Gilly lands on you.
Gilly, you don’t land there you dock to it
Gilly: Jump and you miss it.
Gilly. The place where you can't fall in love. Where you can't fall in anything.
Gilly: trip when you're running here and you end up in Eve orbit.
